title: Ambient Video Game Music - Stormy Jungle 2
description: The tempest continues! Expand your sonic arsenal with Stormy Jungle Soundscapes, Volume 2, the adrenaline-pumping sequel bursting with 10 new immersive ambiences.
longDescription:
The tempest continues! Expand your sonic arsenal with Stormy Jungle Soundscapes, Volume 2, the adrenaline-pumping sequel bursting with 10 new immersive ambiences.


Deeper immersion, wider diversity:


10 unique soundscapes, each 3 minutes long, for a total of 30 minutes of fresh jungle fury.

Dive deeper into the storm: Explore nocturnal downpours, torrential waterfalls, flash floods, and distant lightning strikes.

Encounter unseen creatures: Hear eerie gibbon calls, howler monkeys echoing through the tempest, and exotic insects buzzing amidst the rain.

Expanded atmospheres: Discover abandoned temples swallowed by the storm, windswept canopies, and rushing rivers carving through the jungle.


Ideal for:


Experienced creators: Push the boundaries of your projects with even more diverse and dynamic jungle environments.

Layer and combine: Create truly unique soundscapes by blending tracks from both volumes.

Build anticipation: Use Volume 1 to set the stage, then unleash the full fury of Volume 2 for unforgettable climaxes.


Own Stormy Jungle Soundscapes, Volume 2 for just $19.99 and continue your descent into the heart of the tempest.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEnrwhnWSaY

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xYCXQouNoHY

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PSsvKpJ16jc


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
